name: Lion's Little Lark
description:
Help this faceless lion roll his way through fairly simple levels. This acted as a means of learning Unity and was originally intended to have more, but now I'm just interested in moving on to other projects, so I've strung together what I've done into something vaguely complete. 

Control

  • W/A/S/D or left joystick to move
  • Spacebar or A on the gamepad to confirm options, change map view, and speed up level intros.
